title: Salesforce + Docxtemplater SOW Automation
description:
A customer wants Zoma to automatically generate a Statement of Work (SOW) when their Salesforce opportunity
reaches the 'Proposal' stage. The SOW must be based on a Docxtemplater template, include a bottom-up estimation
table, and reference past similar opportunities to calibrate phase durations. The system should also push the
generated document to S3 and link it back in Salesforce.
constraints: Strict JSON schema for phase breakdown output
Latency target: < 5s end-to-end on average for top-3 similarity + generation (mock acceptable)
